Lord of Griffin's Roost0214895z1i278klk2nlhaldr1dqqkn3dhgcde1492302014-06-26T22:16:06ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603'''Lord of Griffin's Roost''' is a title formerly held by the ruler of the castle [[Griffin's Roost]] in [[the Stormlands]]. After [[Robert's Rebellion]], the title was downgraded to [[Knight of Griffin's Roost]], due to [[Jon Connington]] being a prominent supporter of the [[House Targaryen|Targaryen dynasty]]. It is held by [[House Connington]], vassals of [[House Baratheon]].

==Known Lords and Ladies of Griffin's Roost==
* Lord {[[Jon Connington]]} - The head of [[House Connington]] and [[Hand of the King]]
